txt.en: '...or how you led your allies to ruin at the gates of Dol Guldur!'
'The mere spear of a Man could not fell this beast, nor save him from his fate!'
'The one called Faramir is in my keeping, and there he shall remain until all the weaknesses of Minas Tirith are torn from him!'
'I have watched from above as you sought the leader of these wretched Men, and I bear the very truth you seek...'
'Let us see if you lead those foolish enough to place their faith in you to despair once more!'
